The ecosystems education center will allow Bartram's Garden to offer year-round opportunities to local students, and the mussels will help improve water quality and ecological conditions in the Schuylkill River.

Spent my morning along the banks of the Schuylkill celebrating $925,000 in federal funding we secured to support the construction of a new ecosystems education center and freshwater mussel hatchery.

The project is a joint venture led by @BartramsGarden  and @DelawareEstuary. https://t.co/9GMleS5pvp

The amendment just introduced by Rep. Massie would have exempted those registered for Selective Service from a provision barring people under 21 from buying assault weapons.

Spoiler: That would mean exempting only young men 18-21.

Truly astonishing. Thankfully, it was defeated.
